explains: n. 棱镜；[晶体][数] 棱柱
wordGroup: pentagonal prism [物]五角棱镜；[数]五棱柱
polarizing prism 起偏光棱镜；偏振棱镜
wollaston prism 沃拉斯顿棱镜

sentences.en: Light is refracted when passed through a prism.
sentences.cn: 光通过棱镜时产生折射。

sentences.en: A spectrum is formed by a ray of light passing through a prism.
sentences.cn: 一束光通过棱镜就会形成光谱。

sentences.en: This light is passed through a prism, which breaks it up into a spectrum.
sentences.cn: 这种光通过棱镜，而棱镜把它分割成了一道光谱。
